results.name: Triangle S(n,k) by rows: coefficients of 3^((n-1)/2))*(x^(1/3)*d/dx)^n when n is odd, and of 3^(n/2)*(x^(2/3)*d/dx)^n when n is even.
link: U. N. Katugampola, Mellin Transforms of Generalized Fractional Integrals and Derivatives, Appl. Math. Comput. 257(2015) 566-580.
U. N. Katugampola, Existence and Uniqueness results for a class of Generalized Fractional Differential Equations, arXiv preprint arXiv:1411.5229, 2014
results.author: _Udita Katugampola_, Mar 18 2013
